message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this amazing product with you! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on this valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $7500. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $8500. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the value of the product to you.

Thank you for the compromise, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $8000, but no higher. Can you meet me at this price?

I understand your position, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm not willing to sell the product at $8000. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer: I'll sell the product to you for $8200. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the value of the product to me.
